ValidationRule.description: SF-158 This validation rule should ensure, that all Zip Codes are in the correct format according to their respective country. Format ("\\d{3}") or ("\\d{5}"). Example: 999 or 99999.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(PostalCode )), Country == "TW"), NOT( OR( REGEX(PostalCode, ("\\d{3}")), REGEX(PostalCode, ("\\d{5}")) ) ),FALSE) && $Permission.Core_Lead_Bypass_Validation_Rules = FALSE
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid format for the Zip Code! This should consist of three or five numbers. Example: 999 or 99999
